title: POD - GOG
description:
genre                  racing / arcade / sci-fi
    download size          163 MB
    release date           February 28, 1997
    compatible with        Windows (XP, Vista, 7)
    languages              English
    developer / publisher  Ubisoft / Ubisoft
    game modes             single-player, multi-player

    Bonus content included for FREE with purchase:
    manual
    race music

What's cool about it:

    Sci-Fi arcade racing game with a surprisingly complex and detailed backstory.
    16 customizable cars with a well-implemented vehicle damage system.
    32 tracks, each with a unique theme and setting, coupled with fantastic art design.

Overview:

Customize your own turbo-charged machine and prepare to rip through futuristic environments, subterranean tunnels, abandoned canyons, and surreal post-nuclear landscapes. Link up to eight simultaneous players, just to make things more intense. Multiplayer notice: The game's multiplayer servers have been taken offline and the only multiplayer options available are LAN and local split-screen.

Age requirements: ESRB Rating: EVERYONE

Minimum system requirements: Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1.8 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 2GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard.
